comments:
Build: Callisto 3.2

To reproduce:

1. Download and install Sleak (http://studiodev.torolab.ibm.com/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi/~checkout~/main-home/information/sleak/sleak.html)

2. Launch WTP

3. Launch the XDoclet EJB wizard, click cancel.

4. Using Sleak, take a SWT resource snap shot

5. Launch the XDoclet EJB wizard again, click cancel.

6. Using Sleak, take a SWT resource diff. The following 2 images shows up. They should be deallocated when the XDoclet EJB wizard closes.

First image:

java.lang.Error
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.new_Object(Device.java:753)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image.<init>(Image.java:491)
	at org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageDescriptor.createImage(ImageDescriptor.java:295)
	at org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageDescriptor.createImage(ImageDescriptor.java:233)
	at org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageDescriptor.createImage(ImageDescriptor.java:211)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.ejb.annotation.ui.internal.cmp.wizards.ChooseTableWizardPage.<init>(ChooseTableWizardPage.java:61)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.ejb.annotation.ui.internal.cmp.wizards.AddContainerManagedEntityEjbWizard.doAddPages(AddContainerManagedEntityEjbWizard.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks.internal.datamodel.ui.DataModelWizard.addPages(DataModelWizard.java:77)



Second image:

	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image.<init>(Image.java:491)

	at org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageDescriptor.createImage(ImageDescriptor.java:211)

	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.ejb.annotation.ui.internal.cmp.wizards.AddContainerManagedEntityEjbWizard.doAddPages(AddContainerManagedEntityEjbWizard.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks.internal.datamodel.ui.DataModelWizard.addPages(DataModelWizard.java:77)
I have a patch for this. Changing priority to P2 for consideration in WTP 1.5.1. I am also cc-ing John because my patch touches wst.common.frameworks.ui. John can you review the patch? Thanks.

Created an attachment (id=47871)
Patch for jst.j2ee.ejb.annotations.ui

Created an attachment (id=47872)
Patch for wst.common.frameworks.ui
Jason, this is a change to the Data Model wizard framework.  Can you comment?

This change looks OK at the moment because it doesn't look like rootPageGroup.getPages() will create any new pages.  Jefrey can you confirm the only implementer of AddabePageGroup (that isn't test code) is SimplePageGroup?  If that is the only subclass then this looks good.

I did a search for AddabePageGroup... SimplePageGroup showed up and a couple of other classes (both from a test plugin). SimplePageGroup seems to be the only implementer of AddabePageGroup. I'll go ahead and commit the patches. Thanks for reviewing.
This is part of a "mass update" where bugs showing "fixed" between 7/1/2006 and 9/27/2006 are assumed fixed in WTP 1.5.1. feel free to change the target milestone if you know a more accurate setting.
